sn35.19:1.1: “Yo, bhikkhave, cakkhum abhinandati, dukkham so abhinandati.
sn35.19:1.2: Yo dukkham abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmati vadami.
sn35.19:1.5: yo jivham abhinandati, dukkham so abhinandati.
sn35.19:1.6: Yo dukkham abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasma”ti vadami.
sn35.19:1.8: yo manam abhinandati, dukkham so abhinandati.
sn35.19:1.9: Yo dukkham abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasma”ti vadami.
sn35.19:2.1: “Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, cakkhum nabhinandati, dukkham so nabhinandati.
sn35.19:2.2: Yo dukkham nabhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmati vadami.
sn35.19:2.5: yo jivham nabhinandati, dukkham so nabhinandati.
sn35.19:2.6: Yo dukkham nabhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmati vadami.
sn35.19:2.8: yo manam nabhinandati, dukkham so nabhinandati.
sn35.19:2.9: Yo dukkham nabhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasma”ti vadami.
